Text: I hate to even remotely gripe about this incredibly gorgeous and generous rip - which, unlike most DVDR uploads, includes the menu and the half-hour extra feature (which, as far as I know, is only on the BluRay in the USA) - but the subs (optional) are only available in Dutch.  With so much whispered voice-over (the source of which is not always clear), you really need to have English subs, too.  Otherwise: 10/10.

Please upload this movie.One of best Thriller
